TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogWatcher extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: Permite suscribirse a los eventos entrantes.

span.span: Allows you to subscribe to incoming events.

summary.span: Cada vez que un evento deseado se publica en un registro de eventos, se provoca el evento y se ejecuta el método que administra este evento.

span.span: Each time a desired event is published to an event log, the event is raised, and the method that handles this event will be executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las instancias de esta clase se crean desde objetos, que especifican una consulta para la suscripción de eventos.The instances of this class are created from objects, which specify a query for the event subscription. Cuando se registra un evento que cumple los criterios expresados en la consulta, se provoca el evento .When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the event is raised. ## Examples Por ejemplo de código con esta clase, vea [Cómo: suscribirse a eventos en un registro de eventos](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4).For example code using this class, see [How to: Subscribe to Events in an Event Log](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4).

span.span: If any event is logged in this event log, then the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery eventQuery, class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark bookmark) cil managed
Public Sub New (eventQuery As EventLogQuery, bookmark As EventBookmark)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: eventQuery
param.span: Especifica una consulta de la suscripción de eventos.

span.span: Specifies a query for the event subscription.

param.span: Cuando se registra un evento que cumple los criterios expresados en la consulta, se provoca el evento .

span.span: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the event is raised.

param.name: bookmark
param.span: Marcador (marcador de posición) que se utiliza como posición inicial en el registro o la secuencia de eventos.

span.span: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events.

param.span: La consulta sólo devolverá los eventos registrados después del evento de marcador.

span.span: Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase especificando una consulta de evento y el marcador que se usa como posición inicial de la consulta.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying an event query and a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query.

MemberSignature.Value: public EventLogWatcher (System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery eventQuery, System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark bookmark, bool readExistingEvents);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery eventQuery, class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark bookmark, bool readExistingEvents) cil managed
Public Sub New (eventQuery As EventLogQuery, bookmark As EventBookmark, readExistingEvents As Boolean)

param.name: eventQuery
param.span: Especifica una consulta de la suscripción de eventos.

span.span: Specifies a query for the event subscription.

param.span: Cuando se registra un evento que cumple los criterios expresados en la consulta, se provoca el evento .

span.span: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the event is raised.

param.name: bookmark
param.span: Marcador (marcador de posición) que se utiliza como posición inicial en el registro o la secuencia de eventos.

span.span: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events.

param.span: La consulta sólo devolverá los eventos registrados después del evento de marcador.

span.span: Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.

param.name: readExistingEvents
param.span: Valor booleano que determina si se van a leer los eventos que ya existen en el registro de eventos.

span.span: A Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.

param.span: Si este valor es , se leerán los eventos existentes; si este valor es , no se leerán los eventos existentes.

span.span: If this value is , then the existing events are read and if this value is , then the existing events are not read.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase especificando una consulta de evento, el marcador que se utiliza como posición inicial de la consulta y un valor booleano que determina si se van a leer los eventos que ya existen en el registro de eventos.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying an event query, a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query, and a Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.

summary.span: Determina si este objeto comienza a entregar eventos al delegado de eventos.

span.span: Determines whether this object starts delivering events to the event delegate.

value.span: Devuelve cuando este objeto puede entregar eventos al delegado de eventos; devuelve cuando este objeto ha detenido la entrega.

span.span: Returns when this object can deliver events to the event delegate, and returns when this object has stopped delivery.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event EventRecordWritten As EventHandler(Of EventRecordWrittenEventArgs)

summary.span: Permite establecer un delegado (método de control de eventos) al que se va a llamar cada vez que se publique un evento que cumple los criterios especificados en la consulta de evento de este objeto.

span.span: Allows setting a delegate (event handler method) that gets called every time an event is published that matches the criteria specified in the event query for this object.

remarks.format: ## Examples Por ejemplo de código con esta clase, vea [Cómo: suscribirse a eventos en un registro de eventos](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4).For example code using this class, see [How to: Subscribe to Events in an Event Log](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4).
